feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Subgraph Neural Networks
entry.content: Subgraph neural networks learn powerful subgraph representations that create fundamentally new opportunities for predictions beyond nodes, edges, and entire graphs.
entry.summary: Subgraph neural networks learn powerful subgraph representations that create fundamentally new opportunities for predictions beyond nodes, edges, and entire graphs.

entry.title: Defense Against Adversarial Attacks
entry.content: GNNGuard can defend graph neural networks against a variety of training-time attacks. Remarkably, GNNGuard can restore state-of-the-art performance of any GNN in the face of adversarial attacks.
entry.summary: GNNGuard can defend graph neural networks against a variety of training-time attacks. Remarkably, GNNGuard can restore state-of-the-art performance of any GNN in the face of adversarial attacks.

entry.title: Graph Meta Learning via Subgraphs
entry.content: G-Meta is a meta-learning approach for graphs that quickly adapts to new prediction tasks using only a handful of data points. G-Meta works in most challenging, few-shot learning settings and scales to massive interactomics data as we show on our new Networks of Life dataset comprising of 1,840 networks.
entry.summary: G-Meta is a meta-learning approach for graphs that quickly adapts to new prediction tasks using only a handful of data points. G-Meta works in most challenging, few-shot learning settings and scales to massive interactomics data as we show on our new Networks of Life dataset comprising of 1,840 networks.

entry.title: The Open Graph Benchmark
entry.content: A new paper introducing the Open Graph Benchmark, a diverse set of challenging and realistic benchmark datasets for graph machine learning.
entry.summary: A new paper introducing the Open Graph Benchmark, a diverse set of challenging and realistic benchmark datasets for graph machine learning.

entry.title: Special Issue on AI for COVID-19

link.title: Special Issue on AI for COVID-19

entry.content: Marinka is co-editing a special issue of IEEE Big Data on AI for COVID-19. In light of the urgent need for data-driven solutions to mitigate the COVID-19 pandemic, the special issue will aim for a fast-track peer review.
entry.summary: Marinka is co-editing a special issue of IEEE Big Data on AI for COVID-19. In light of the urgent need for data-driven solutions to mitigate the COVID-19 pandemic, the special issue will aim for a fast-track peer review.

entry.title: Multiscale Interactome
entry.content: A new preprint on discovering disease treatment mechanisms through the multiscale interactome.
entry.summary: A new preprint on discovering disease treatment mechanisms through the multiscale interactome.

entry.title: Molecular Interaction Networks
entry.content: A new preprint describing a graph neural network approach for the prediction of molecular interactions, including drug-drug, drug-target, protein-protein, and gene-disease interactions.
entry.summary: A new preprint describing a graph neural network approach for the prediction of molecular interactions, including drug-drug, drug-target, protein-protein, and gene-disease interactions.

entry.title: Submit to PhD Forum at ECML

link.title: Submit to PhD Forum at ECML

entry.content: The call for ECML-PKDD 2020 PhD Forum Track is now online. If you are a PhD student, submit your work on machine learning and knowledge discovery.
entry.summary: The call for ECML-PKDD 2020 PhD Forum Track is now online. If you are a PhD student, submit your work on machine learning and knowledge discovery.

entry.title: Drug Repurposing for COVID-19
entry.content: We are excited to share our latest results on how networks and graph machine-learning help us search for a cure for COVID-19.
entry.summary: We are excited to share our latest results on how networks and graph machine-learning help us search for a cure for COVID-19.

entry.title: AI Cures
entry.content: We are joining AI Cures initiative at MIT! We will develop machine learning methods for finding promising antiviral molecules for COVID-19 and other emerging pathogens.
entry.summary: We are joining AI Cures initiative at MIT! We will develop machine learning methods for finding promising antiviral molecules for COVID-19 and other emerging pathogens.
